'http' : 'https'; if (!d.getElementById(id)) { js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id; js.src = p + "://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js"; fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs); } } (document, "script", "twitter-wjs");

div.a: Andy Wilkinson named next Grizzell Principal

br.span: During its regular meeting on April 13, the Dublin City Schools Board of Education approved Dublin Jerome High School Assistant Principal Andy Wilkinson as the next principal of Grizzell Middle School effective Aug. 1.

div.a: Important information for the Class of 2020

br.span:
Dear Parents,
The COVID-19 pandemic has had a profound impact on our entire world. In a normal school year, our seniors should be enjoying the last few months in Dublin City Schools with their friends and teachers.

div.a: Special Board meeting on April 7 Video

br.span: The Dublin City Schools Board of Education met in special session at 7 p.m. on April 7.

span.a: Click here for the 2020-21 intra-district open enrollment form.

span.style: color: #272727; font-family: Arial, serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff

span.span: During these unprecedented times with students around the world learning from home, the demands on education technology have shifted significantly — almost overnight.

div.a: School closure extended through the end of the 2019-2020 school year

br.span:
Dear Parents,
Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine extended the current closure of our school buildings through the end of the school year due to COVID-19.

div.a: Welcome back from Spring Break message from Dr. Hoadley

br.span: I hope you have enjoyed time with your families over this spring break week. I know we are all following the events surrounding COVID-19 and the profound impact it is having across the globe.
The most current information on International Baccalaureate and Advanced Placement testing.

div.a: Our Welcome and Registration Center Temporarily Closed Due to Covid-19

br.span: Please note: Our Welcome and Registration Center is temporarily closed due to COVID-19.

div.a: Board approves two new elementary principals

br.span: During its regular meeting on March 16, the Dublin City Schools Board of Education approved Dr. Porsha Robinson-Ervin as the next principal of Deer Run Elementary School effective Aug. 1 and Josh Page as the new principal of Eli Pinney Elementary School effective Aug. 1.

div.p: Web Accessibility & Functionality Specifications: If a person with a disability experiences inaccessible online content related to a Dublin City Schools' program, benefit or service, the person should contact the District's Public Information Officer [email protected] in order to obtain the content in an accessible format. The individual may also file a formal complaint utilizing the procedures set out in Board Policies 2260 and 2260.01 relating to Section 504 and Title II.
